description: AutoCAD supported MNS files prior to version 2006. MNS files are the same as .MNU files, but cannot contain special formatting or comments.

NOTE: Autodesk replaced MNS files by the .CUI file format in AutoCAD 2006. CUI files were later replaced by .CUIX files in AutoCAD 2010. MNS files can be converted to CUIX files using the Transfer tab of the CUI command in AutoCAD 2010.
